articles.author: Patty Wellborn
articles.title: Mathematical proof debunks the idea that the universe is a computer simulation - Phys.org
articles.description: It's a plot device beloved by science fiction: our entire universe might be a simulation running on some advanced civilization's supercomputer. But new research from UBC Okanagan has mathematically proven this isn't just unlikely—it's impossible.
